grip_robot module¶

This module controls the Gripper Robots, it inherits from Robot3D

class grip_robot.GripRobot(revpi, name: str, line_name: str, moving_position: Position)[source]¶

Bases: Robot3D

Controls the Gripper Robot.

Methodes:

grip(): Grip Product. release(): Release Product. reset_claw(): Reset claw to init position.

GRIPPER_CLOSED¶

Value at which the gripper is closed.

Type:

int

GRIPPER_OPENED¶

Value at which the gripper is opened.

Type:

int

__encoder_claw¶

Encoder (counter) for claw.

Type:

Sensor

__motor_claw¶

Motor for claw.

Type:

Actuator

grip(as_thread=True)[source]¶

Grip Product.

Parameters:

as_thread (bool) – Runs the function as a thread.

release(as_thread=True)[source]¶

Release product.

Parameters:

as_thread (bool) – Runs the function as a thread.

reset_claw(as_thread=True)[source]¶

Reset claw to init position.

Parameters:

as_thread (bool) – Runs the function as a thread.
